modName: Convenient Unofficial Enhanced Better Ultimate Immersive Overhaul
summary:
This is for those that like hardcore challenges.
I never liked how easy the game was, so I made this mod to make it a bit more interesting and somewhat a challenge. With this mod, vanilla mudcrabs will be just a bit stronger (Look screenshots).
Requirements: Skyrim.

You have permission to edit this file as long as you ask
descriptionHtml:
This is for those that like hardcore challenges.Â 
I never liked how easy the game was, so I made this mod to make it a bit more interesting and somewhat a challenge. With this mod, leveled mudcrabs will be an actual challenge!
If you think this is too softcore, just tell me!

Requirements: Skyrim.
You have permission to edit this file as long as you ask me for permission.
WARNING: I don't know anything about making mods.

NOTE: The change made is so small that it is smaller than 1kb. It just modifies lvled mudcrabs.
author: Olympic
